turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, how are you? On your way to the office, can you order a Caffe Mocha from Peets, think I'm going to need one for this hectic day ahead.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: For easy access, it's best to use the location at: DC—Navy Yard 1115 New Jersey Avenue SE Washington, DC 20003.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: They have been at that address for quite some time now. Can't believe that I found out only recently.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No worries! What would you like inside your coffee and what size, the usual?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No! Lets try something different. I'll have a large Caffe Mocha, with non-fat milk. The doctor informed me that I need to come off the milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem. Healthy eating I see!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yep. Plus it's tasty too. What exactly is included in Caffe Mocha?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: One sec! Espresso, chocolate, seamed milk and whipped cream is included. All in the same order as I mentioned.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Wow, sounds great!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I should have one my self.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I think you should too! Plus I hear it's taster than the leading brand.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Wow, really?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes according to my knowledge! Only one way to find out.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok will do. I'll try the same as you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great choice.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I hope so!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sure is, it consists of Rich espresso and house-made chocolate sauce rendezvous with creamy steamed milk under a blanket of fresh whipped cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. So your Caffe Mocha is confirmed at your requested location: DC—Navy Yard 1115 New Jersey Avenue SE Washington, DC 20003. Your receipt is available shortly. One more thing; your receipt will be sent to your mobile device via text message

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great thanks. You are the best assistant ever!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Aww, Thank you!
